game_description: Classic maze game with a ball, but only from start. In the third level it change to jumpscare nightmare! Lend the device to your friends and see what happen. !!! WARNING !!! Scare can be very intensive. Everything happen is up to you and your responsibility.
review_1: Good simple fun, made my cousin jump hard
review_2: Video playthrough here: https://youtu.be/B1megJNEYyM I experienced some very effective jump scares whilst just playing this game by myself and knowing that a fright was on the way, imagine the impact if you give the headset to a friend without telling them what's coming! "Oh, try this maze puzzle game" ;)
review_3: This was an awesome, quick, Jump scare to my friends and family! It was absolutely hilarious and I would highly recommend!
review_4: I love the jump scares its so cool game
review_5: Prank your friends. Never gets old!
